GitHub Projects

Here, you can find the list of most relevant projects I have in my GitHub account. For more details of the research projects I have contributed to, please take a look at Research Portfolio.

Scientific Computing

  • BioDeg, a biodegradation and corrosion simulation code for metallic materials
  • BioDeg-UI, graphical user interface for BioDeg corrosion simulation code
  • General Coupled Navier-Stokes-Diffusion Equations Solver using Finite Element Method
  • Bayesian Optimization for Finite Element Parameter Estimation
  • Skeletal Cell Atlas web app developed using Dash

Machine Learning

  • ECG Classification with Federated-Learning and Differential-Privacy in Keras, Convolutional Neural Network Implementation
  • ECG Classification with Federated-Learning in Keras, Shallow Implementation
  • ECG Signals Classification using scikit-learn

Educational

  • An Easy Introduction to Finite Element Method and Variational Formulation
  • An Open Source Crash Course on Parameter Estimation of Computational Models using a Bayesian Optimization Approach
  • Mastering Machine Learning with Python in Six Steps

Teaching Materials

  • Computer Methods for Mass Transport in Tissue Engineering, Fall 2021
  • Computer Methods for Mass Transport in Tissue Engineering, Spring 2021

Beamer Presentations
